name: Scarecrow hunter
description:
Scarecrow hunter is action and adventure game made by indie developer Yupi Games. Mission is very simple: kill the scarecrows as much as you can and stay a live! Game is still under developing in future multiple levels will be added, more animations, special effects and more. Stay tuned! Game has:

- great graphic
- great sound effects
- great animations
- great lightning

You can donate and help this project to continue or download the game from Google Play and launch the ad. Be part of this project!

Thank you,

Sincerely Yupi Games

We have launched indiegogo project. Help us to reach the goal. Make it happen!

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/dwarf-s-adventu.../story

For more information visit and like Yupi Games on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Yupi-Games/286578011548312

Or subscribe on you tube channel:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvNa9Lo3CRKuoXb3_qRUoWA?view_as=public
